metadata.title: TimeClust: A clustering tool for gene expression time series
metadata.abstract: Summary: TimeClust is a user-friendly software package to cluster genes according to their temporal expression profiles. It can be conveniently used to analyze data obtained from DNA microarray time-course experiments. It implements two original algorithms specifically designed for clustering short time series together with hierarchical clustering and self-organizing maps. © The Author 2007. Published by Oxford University Press. All rights reserved.

description: TimeClust is a user-friendly software package to cluster genes according to their temporal expression profiles. name: TimeClust
